程序包 com.example.catchthecode

类 QRcode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.catchthecode.QRcode
  • public class QRcode
extends java.lang.Object
    represent the QR code and correpsonding information

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      QRcode​(java.lang.String url)
      Constructs a new QRcode object with the specified URL.
      QRcode​(java.lang.String url, android.widget.ImageView qrCodeIV)
      Constructs a new QRcode object with the specified URL and image view.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      int convertScore​(char c, int l)
      Convert the score based on hash.
      int gethash()
      Calculates and returns a hash code based on the URL of the QR code.
      android.widget.ImageView getImageview()
      Returns the image view of the QR code.
      java.lang.String getqrName()
      Returns the name of the QR code.
      int getqrScore()
      Returns the current score of the QR code.
      java.lang.String getQrVR()
      Get the ASCII art representation of the QR code.
      void setImageview()
      Sets the image view of the QR code by generating a new QR code image with the specified URL and dimensions.
      void setqrName()
      Sets the name of the QR code by generating a string from the hash of the URL.
      void setQrVR()
      Set the ASCII art representation of the QR code.
      void setScore()
      Set the score of the QR code based on its URL.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • QRcode

        public QRcode​(java.lang.String url,
              android.widget.ImageView qrCodeIV)
       throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Constructs a new QRcode object with the specified URL and image view. Generates the QR code's name, VR, score, and image view.
        参数:
        url - the URL to encode in the QR code
        qrCodeIV - the ImageView in which to display the QR code
        抛出:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if SHA-256 algorithm is not available

      • QRcode

        public QRcode​(java.lang.String url)
       throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Constructs a new QRcode object with the specified URL. Generates the QR code's name, VR, and score.
        参数:
        url - the URL to encode in the QR code
        抛出:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if SHA-256 algorithm is not available

    • 方法详细资料

      • setImageview

        public void setImageview()
        Sets the image view of the QR code by generating a new QR code image with the specified URL and dimensions.

      • getImageview

        public android.widget.ImageView getImageview()
        Returns the image view of the QR code.
        返回:
        the ImageView object representing the QR code

      • setqrName

        public void setqrName()
        Sets the name of the QR code by generating a string from the hash of the URL.

      • getqrName

        public java.lang.String getqrName()
        Returns the name of the QR code.
        返回:
        the name of the QR code as a string

      • setQrVR

        public void setQrVR()
        Set the ASCII art representation of the QR code.

      • getQrVR

        public java.lang.String getQrVR()
        Get the ASCII art representation of the QR code.
        返回:
        ASCII art representation of the QR code.

      • setScore

        public void setScore()
              throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Set the score of the QR code based on its URL.
        抛出:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if SHA-256 algorithm is not available.

      • convertScore

        public int convertScore​(char c,
                        int l)
        Convert the score based on hash.
        参数:
        c - character in hexadecimal representation of the hash.
        l - number of occurrences of the character in the hash.
        返回:
        score of the character based on its frequency in the hash.

      • getqrScore

        public int getqrScore()
        Returns the current score of the QR code.
        返回:
        the score of the QR code

      • gethash

        public int gethash()
        Calculates and returns a hash code based on the URL of the QR code.
        返回:
        the hash code of the QR code
